title.b: How to use the calculator app on the iPhone

prereq.p: Ensure that the Calculator app is installed in phone.

context.p:
Using this app, you can do the following tasks:
Add numbers
Subtract numbers
Multiply numbers
Divide numbers

ol.li: Tap operator + for adding, - for subtraction, * for multiplication, or / for division.

li.p: Note: Tap C button to delete the entered value.

result.p: User can see the result on the screen.
